CertificateId.description: A unique identifier for the certificate.

Tag.description: Creates a key-value pair for a specific resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.

type.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.

type.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.

properties.name: As2Id
properties.description: AS2 identifier agreed with a trading partner.

type.description: AS2 identifier agreed with a trading partner.

properties.name: CertificateIds
properties.description: List of the certificate IDs associated with this profile to be used for encryption and signing of AS2 messages.

type.description: List of the certificate IDs associated with this profile to be used for encryption and signing of AS2 messages.

properties.name: ProfileType
properties.description: Enum specifying whether the profile is local or associated with a trading partner.

type.description: Enum specifying whether the profile is local or associated with a trading partner.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the profile.

type.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the profile.

properties.name: ProfileId
properties.description: A unique identifier for the profile

type.description: A unique identifier for the profile
